clinical_history: Follow-up PET-CT after chemotherapy to assess treatment response.
findings: Diffuse mild increased uptake in liver, likely benign.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in brain frontal lobe with SUVmax 9.2.
Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
Focal uptake in brain frontal lobe consistent with post-surgical changes.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in brain frontal lobe, suggestive of malignancy.
No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
recommendations: Refer to oncology or specialist for further management.
